SalesforceQuote.name: SalesforceQuote
SalesforceQuote.description: Read-only virtual object used in the Your Account App. Represents information about your organization’s quotes with Salesforce.

ExternalId.description: External reference ID set by Salesforce.

QuoteNumber.description: A system-generated number that identifies the quote.

SalesforceContractId.description: ID of the contract that’s associated with the quote.
